title: 24: S3E24 – "Omens and Abominations" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors Roxanne Wilds, Jacob Newell, Chris Phoenix, and Mark Lannin, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about ominous omens, aquatic abominations, household horrors, and paranormal pursuits. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s3e24
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
